name: Fiesta Frittata
description: With a 'fiesta' of flavours, this spiced-up egg dish makes a great meatless dinner while still packing in the protein.
preparation: Lightly whisk eggs in a bowl, then whisk in Herb & Garlic Dip Mix and Poco Picante Salsa Mix.
Pour into a lightly oiled 9” pie plate and bake for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, stir beans with pepper and 1⁄4 cup cheese.
Spoon bean mixture over baked pie and sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Continue to bake for about 20-25 minutes, until cheese melts and eggs are set.
Stir prepared Poco Picante Salsa with corn. Cut frittata into wedges and serve with salsa.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
